entry.source: At last, the Hunter Tournament Finals are{F801}about to begin. All Hunters representing{F801}their districts, meet at the Tokyo Dome in{F801}Suidobashi. We'll have all the old favorites{F801}competing this year, as well as one{F801}surprising rookie. It's going to be crazy!{F801}
